channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Faster Typing Is Just A Case Of Splitting Your Keyboard In Two Like The Elytra From Elim
item.description: This Elytra keyboard from Elim forces the user to adopt a better typing postion and stops the hands crossing over by splitting the keyboard into two h...

item.title: If Telegram Is On Your iPhone Or Android Phone, Secure Your Account Now
item.description: Do not lose your account — make this change today.

item.title: New Technique Of Selective Gradient Masking Localizes Suspected Harmful AI-Based Mental Health Knowledge And Renders It Expungable
item.description: AI can give out bad mental health advice. This can occur due to initial training. A new technique uses knowledge localization to flag and remove it. A...

item.title: Healthcare In 2025: A Year Of Chaos, Confusion — But Little Improvement
item.description: A yearlong pattern of intense disruption followed by little improvement played out across nearly every major healthcare storyline in 2025.

item.title: Critical Amazon Kindle Hack Confirmed — What You Need To Know
item.description: A hacker found a way to access Amazon accounts using a malicious book downloaded to a Kindle. What you need to know about the ebook attack.
